name: Eda (LD34)
description:
Game created in 72 hours for the LDJAM34

Eda is the name given to Bonsai branches: grow and subdivide them carefully to create an harmonious tree.

UPDATE - August 2016
A post-LD demo is now available right here!

UPDATE - May 2016

I'm currently working on a post-LD version of the game!

Controls :

  • left click to grow branches : click in the void to subdivide current branch, click inactive branch part to make it grow.
  • right click to stop the growth of current branch

Development, graphics and design : alpha_rats
Music and sound effects by Mathis Bouron
